n":1}

params.initialOracleManager: Address to use as oracle manager*

params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to retrieve
params.tranchedPool: Address where the tranche is declared

returns.latestRates: Id of the tranche to retrieve*

params.newOracleManager: New address proposed to be oracle manager*

params.newRates: Struct containing the new rates applicable for a tranche*
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche to retrieve
params.tranchedPool: Address where the tranche is declared

params.newStatus: The new status to set for the address*
params.opsAddress: The address for which to update permissions

acceptOracleManager().notice: External permissioned function accepting an oracle manager role*

constructor.notice: Public contructor executed only during deployment, used to set up the initial configuration of the oracle

getLatestTrancheRates(address,uint256).notice: External permissioned fetching the latest applicable rates for a Tranche. the first version of the oracle just returns the rates defined in the mapping, but this could becomes as complex as wanted and reading as many variables from the TranchedPool or BorrowerAccount as wanted. The contract can be re-deployed and re-set in the pool

proposeNewOracleManager(address).notice: External permissioned function proposing a new oracle manager

updateLatestTrancheRates(address,uint256.notice: External permissioned fetching the latest applicable rates for a Tranche

updateOpsAddressStatus(address,bool).notice: External permissioned function updating an operational address status
